text:
Hey, I can actually now confirm that my dissertation went really well  (which was a bit unexpected as I was still adding things 5 min before hand in) and I am very pleased with the result that I got :blush: 
Do you think you could mayve show me some of the stuff that you used to apply for the runner position? Cause I'm pretty sure that my work is not quite good enough to get a junior position right away so I'm looking at more realistic options at the moment because things like this freak me out...
Thank you, that is a lot of info that will definitely be helpful, yet it is a bit confusing for me. Could you break it down a little? Do you mean making these settings in maya directly? How would you do the surface imperfection maps then? Or do you mean making the settings in the texturing programme directly? Sorry I'm a bit confused about this. I tried setting up a glass material in hypershade and I feel like it looks weird or something just isn't working properly because when i lit the scene the light would just go straight through the material and leave no shadow on the wall behind it at all...
